By rapidly aligning desired business results with proven omnichannel customer engagement strategies -- crowdsourced from leading brands across your industry -- our platform enables you to accelerate time to value, deliver superior one-on-one experiences and produce measurable results... fast.

Emarsys is the platform of choice for more than 1,500 customers around the world. Join thousands of leading brands who trust Emarsys to deliver the predictable, profitable outcomes that their businesses demand and the highly personalized omnichannel experiences that their customers deserve. For more information, visit www.emarsys.com

Emarsys enables us to communicate with our customers across 4 core channels, email, SMS, web channel and paid social - and track all engagement stats through these communications (plus elements such as browse behaviour) back into our SCV database for review and further action.
We utilise the customer journey analytics and Max AI recommendations to ensure we are closely following our customer lifecycle metrics and taking steps to change / drive behaviours to benefit the business (whether through improving retention through a variety of automation and ad-hoc tactics, or driving additional spend where we can).

initial_reviews.review_title: Effective and user-friendly platform which has helped take our CRM strategy to the next level
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Emarsys has become a key driver in taking our CRM strategy to the next level. It is definitely an intuitive and user-friendly platform. Setting up email campaigns and crafting intricate automation flows feels far easier than other platforms used previously, allowing us to focus more on strategy and creativity rather than getting bogged down in technicalities.

What's truly impressive is the level of detail we can achieve with segmentation. It has enabled us to create hyper-targeted campaigns that resonate on a personal level. Having our account manager set up on our internal comms channel has been a great help, and Emarsys support and guidance tend to be efficient and helpful

The platform's commitment to staying ahead of the curve is evident in its consistent innovation. Features like Mobile Wallet and AI have expanded our capabilities, and the options for personalization and campaign visualization are also worth noting.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
While the data and reporting tools are good enough for the most part, there are moments when exporting revenue/campaign data could be much better. And those last-minute functionality errors can be a bit frustrating - like receiving warnings about missing links or alt text when everything's actually in place.

The platform also lacks the ability to precisely pinpoint a customer's position within their journey at any given time, which does hinder us in regards to understanding customer progression and activity.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Emarsys simplifies and streamlines our campaign management processes.
Its intricate automation and segmentation capabilities empower us to deliver highly targeted and personalized campaigns.
The efficient support desk and the direct line of communication ensure that we receive timely guidance and support, allowing us to maximize the platform's potential.
Updated innovations expand our capabilities, allowing us to explore new avenues and stay ahead of the curve in our industry.

initial_reviews.review_title: Omnichannel Marketing Made Easy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The platform is really user-friendly and they have an excellent customer success team/support team, who are very responsive and help resolve any issues quickly. Prebuilt tactics have been incredibly helpful in order to get revenue-driving automation programs live quickly, across multiple channels, which is essential for us as such a small team managing 5 brands.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
During implementation, we had to design our own email template. We appreciated the freedom of this and how this could be tailored to our different brands, but it would be great if Emarsys could provide a prebuilt best-practice template, with the option to add custom blocks afterwards.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?

Emarsys allows us to provide a more seamless experience across multiple customer touchpoints, including digital ads, email, mobile and web. Previously these channels were siloed but now we can create a complete journey with automated journeys or one-off campaigns, personalised to the customer.

2. Increasing revenue from different customer lifecycle groups:
With our previous customer engagement platforms, the customer lifecycle wasn't something we focused on. The lifecycle reports in Emarsys have helped us to understand our customers better and understand where our best revenue potential is. The pre-built tactics available have strategies for increasing acquisition, purchase frequency, average order value, and retaining customers. We can easily identify quick wins and deploy automation programs to capture lost revenue or stop active customers from churning.

initial_reviews.review_title: Unlocking the potential of our first party data
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Emarsys provides an exceptional experience as a user-friendly and innovative platform. The block-based templates are not only simple and easy to use, but also incredibly efficient, offering a smooth and fast user experience. The platform also has seamless integrations with other platforms such as our new SMS provider. It also introduces unique features such as barcode generation that we hadn't had the chance to use in the past but we're excited to explore.

Emarsys' automation/journey builder simplifies the campaign planning process by making it user-friendly and intuitive. Above all, the ability to create segments directly from our hosted database is a huge win, providing us with a direct link to that data when we need to target our audiences accurately.

The dedicated implementation team allowed for a smooth transition from our old platform and they were a pleasure to work with.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Despite the many strengths of Emarsys, there is room for improvement in the area of content organisation. Currently, the platform lacks a proper folder structure to categorise and manage emails and segments. This makes it somewhat challenging to differentiate and manage past, current, and future content.

Having a folder system would vastly improve the user experience, making navigation and content management much more straightforward and intuitive. I hope to see this addition in future updates.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our previous platform wasn't overly user-friendly, it was clunky and difficult to execute campaigns efficiently or quickly. Emarsys is very user-friendly and allows us to create and send campaigns much faster and segment our audience further.

initial_reviews.review_title: Emarsys is a powerful tool for those seeking to deliver personalised campaigns that drive results.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Our organisation is in the final stages of implementing the Emarsys platform, and we can already see that it will be an exceptional tool that revolutionises how we personalise our customer experience. Our ability to build relational data segments within the platform initially drew us to Emarsys. This function has enabled us to be specific with targeting, customisation and personalisation in campaign sends, automation programs and SMS campaigns across the board.

The custom URL functionality within the SMS platform adds another layer of personalisation. Creating branded links has enhanced the user experience and improved click through rates as the SMS links have more credibility in the eyes of the consumer.

The reporting dashboard is a one-stop shop for reporting and analysing performance, facilitating data-driven decision-making for future optimisations.

Emarsys has an easy-to-use interface that simplifies campaign management. Even those without extensive technical expertise can navigate the platform effortlessly. The intuitive layout and seamless integration of features make it a breeze to track results and access actionable insights.

The platform offers unparalleled capabilities in my opinion. With its ability to build relational data segments, customizable automation programs, custom URL functionality, and user-friendly interface, Emarsys is a powerful tool for marketers seeking to deliver personalised and engaging campaigns that drive results.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
I find the lack of logical folder structure in Emarsys the only downside . All past campaign sends and automation programs are grouped within a single folder, making organising and retrieving specific campaigns difficult. You can search by category or keyword which is good, however, we would greatly benefit from a more organised system and folder structure to streamline campaign management. We have seven brands within our portfolio, so we would prefer a folder structure where we could organise campaign sends via their brands.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
The previous platform we used was clunky, difficult to navigate and not overly user-friendly. Emarsys UI is easy to navigate and intuitive. The drag-and-drop email builder has reduced campaign build times by half. Productivity has increased. The ability to segment has never been more efficient via relational data segmentation. This has resulted in more tailored and personalised segmentation.

App Push: We are using React Native and there have been so many react native updates on Github that our developers are tired of this. We are considering removing the product from our package next year

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The platform is really user-friendly and they have an excellent customer success team/support team, who are very responsive and help resolve any issues quickly. Prebuilt tactics have been incredibly helpful in order to get revenue-driving automation programs live quickly, across multiple channels, which is essential for us as such a small team managing 5 brands.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
During implementation, we had to design our own email template. We appreciated the freedom of this and how this could be tailored to our different brands, but it would be great if Emarsys could provide a prebuilt best-practice template, with the option to add custom blocks afterwards.

Emarsys allows us to provide a more seamless experience across multiple customer touchpoints, including digital ads, email, mobile and web. Previously these channels were siloed but now we can create a complete journey with automated journeys or one-off campaigns, personalised to the customer.

2. Increasing revenue from different customer lifecycle groups:
With our previous customer engagement platforms, the customer lifecycle wasn't something we focused on. The lifecycle reports in Emarsys have helped us to understand our customers better and understand where our best revenue potential is. The pre-built tactics available have strategies for increasing acquisition, purchase frequency, average order value, and retaining customers. We can easily identify quick wins and deploy automation programs to capture lost revenue or stop active customers from churning.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Emarsys provides an exceptional experience as a user-friendly and innovative platform. The block-based templates are not only simple and easy to use, but also incredibly efficient, offering a smooth and fast user experience. The platform also has seamless integrations with other platforms such as our new SMS provider. It also introduces unique features such as barcode generation that we hadn't had the chance to use in the past but we're excited to explore.

Emarsys' automation/journey builder simplifies the campaign planning process by making it user-friendly and intuitive. Above all, the ability to create segments directly from our hosted database is a huge win, providing us with a direct link to that data when we need to target our audiences accurately.

The dedicated implementation team allowed for a smooth transition from our old platform and they were a pleasure to work with.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Despite the many strengths of Emarsys, there is room for improvement in the area of content organisation. Currently, the platform lacks a proper folder structure to categorise and manage emails and segments. This makes it somewhat challenging to differentiate and manage past, current, and future content.

Support : our opened tickets often took a lot of back and forth and time to be solved.
Lack of innovation : a common issue for well establised saas company is that once they found a way to be profitable, innovation slows down and new product release cycle are too often influenced by opportunities to grow revenue without thinking of their customers key requests. This sadly became all too visible since SAP acquired Emarsys 2 years ago.

All in all, Emarsys was most likely not the right solution for us and might fit other's need but it seemed important to me to share those feedbacks.

email B2C CRM solution

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We now have a pretty good chunk of our revenue coming from completely automated campaigns, which save labor costs and help us optimize our KPIs. Such a strategy was not possible before working with Emarsys.

all_reviews.review_title: Emarsys Email Marketing Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
I like the options for customizing colors and themes to easily seamline branding, depending on the email and content. I think the webinars and resources available are useful. The Deliverability Advisor is really helpful in making sure subject lines, etc, are up to accessibility and readability standards. For what we pay, I do think what we get is reasonable, although it could be better.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
I do not like how difficult it is to manage and delete contacts, it feels like a very clunky system, and the documentation does not give enough clarity. It is hard to keep track of the contacts and get rid of older contacts; there should be a better way of upkeep. Additionally, in terms of number of total sends and total contacts, I feel like there should be more transparency with the numbers and how they're recorded. It is too vague and hard to keep track of, so it is unfair to suddenly tell us that we went over the limit when we were not warned or told how to make sure we aren't going over. Please do better or at least give support or clarity for overages. Additionally, I feel that the customization options and reporting data are somewhat lacking. I've seen other platforms with more robust and more complete customization and reports.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
Emarsys does its job and has a lot of flexibility and features. Unlike some other platforms they do not charge per contact which could be a positive in terms of cost.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Emarsys we can reach our customers and notify them when we are doing promotions and giveaways. It serves its purpose and is beneficial to our marketing strategy, although it could be better in some aspects.

all_reviews.review_title: Emarsys - Webchannel - Training
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
First of all, the personal contact and offerings like training for free. Getting new features for your daily work and getting a exclusive training is very helpful and not the usual case I guess. For me, this is the best possible service. Web channel is helpful to us as well. Also the implementation of new features was really quick and we were able to use it days after signing the contract. More over we have regular calls to discuss problems or talk about progress or open questions. Great customer service. Before using this new features like overlays I only knew Emarsys as an Newsletter platform - but this is not the case so we can use tools which promote our company, products and reach more people - without the training we would probably not be able to use all the features as efficient as we can do now - so I am really thankful that we had 1,5 hours to get used to the features and as questions. The last small problems we had were all solved within days - the training for examples was also organized within 2 weeks after we signed the contract (which was because this was the earliest we could make it) so we did not loose any time having new features but not being able to use them. Now after the training we are ready to start. One more big advantage is, that the training was recorded so now we can watch it over and over or even show it to other colleagues if there are open questions or we have to train new colleagues to use the features. Furthermore we can use the videotrainings or sign up for more seminars/webinars - as all of them are for free this is really a great offer. Another feature which we can now use without programing anything in our shop environment is discounts/vouchers for our customers - as our Newsletter is gaining more and more subscribers and importance this is a powerful tool and feature to gain even more subscribers. As we only sent 1 Newsletter per week before Covid we are now sending 2-3 newsletters per week and gain new revenues week by week. For me this is a really helpful tool and with the training yesterday I feel like i know everything for the features I want to use in future. Now we can improve our marketing more and more.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Until now, actually nothing. All good - i like working with Emarsys and learning more about it regulary - either by getting personal trainings or using video trainings. This was my second training/webinar and so far there is nothing to complain about. I would recommend Emarsys to others without having a bad feeling about it. The only thing which somebody could dislike is, that without the training some features might be a bit hard to understand in the beginning - but as we got a training this case does not apply to me. In the beginning when I started working with Emarsys the customer support wasn't as good as now - we had a Key Account Manager but communication was not as good as now and we had do wait for answers quite a long time. More over, which we already explained, we are not able to track revenues which were gained by mobile users - but this topic will be discussed and we are no awaiting an answer on that specific problem. My personal downside is the Automation as this is really hard to understand for me - but also for that, there are But all in all I must say that with the trainings we got now and all the new features we have a huge advantage in our work and as we participate with a team of 3 we now got all the things we need to know and can start working with Emarsys and its features.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
My recommendation: definitely use the offered trainings and webinars. They make sense and help you with your everyday work - ask questions and contact your Key Account Manager or support if there are open questions or problems. If you can use as many features as possible to find out which works best for you regarding usability and of course, success (revenue, CTR, and so on). The tools are easy to handle but there is much to learn so start with webinars and learn what you can do and state goals - so you can see how successful your campaign was and to see what could be improved. Organize regular meetings with your Emarsys Key Account Manager and write down questions to discuss them in  a call - this is way better than trying out or using Emarsys in a try and error kind of way. Don't be afraid of asking. And one more thing: if you have, also try to introduce a colleague of yours to the project and to the tool so you have somebody who also knows the system.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can reach more customers by using new functions. We can track the results and success of campaigns, and the most significant benefit is that we can now decide which kind of customers we want to use - and we don't need to update or change settings in our own shop environment. It is not a considerable effort but a great benefit - either by using overlays or the regular newsletter. We can reach our personalized target groups or inform shop visitors about discounts or other company-related news if needed. For example we used overlays, while using the test version, to inform our customers that our telephone system broke down - so every visitor of our shop got this information straight away. More over we promoted new store openings and used targeted overlays only for that region - so we could reach potential new customers for those stores. Besides that we were able to improve our newsletter revenues in the last months - due to Covid our Newsletter was a really important tool to reach customers as well - with the new WebChannel features we have powerful tools to communicate with our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great ESP with lots of functions
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The team at Emarsys were very helpful during the implementation process, from start to finish. Our team had a long list of questions, but the Emarsys team were all very friendly and informative throughout the whole process. We had weekly check-ins with the team, as well as a dedicated Slack group for any ad-hoc updates.

So far, I like how user-friendly the platform is and the advanced analytics and dashboard features. There are a lot of features which we are yet to utilize, so hopefully we will take advantage of those in the near future.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
I find the platform sometimes very slow to load, especially when I am creating campaigns. The blocks used are sometimes temperamental and updates don't show from time to time.

Another issue I recently came across is the support from the engineers. Not the support itself, but the time difference as some of the team are based in Europe so it is difficult to solve a problem which needs to be fixed ASAP.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
Give it a chance and sit through a demo to see what it offers.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
The email deliverability support has been incredibly helpful, and we will continue to use weekly check-ins with the team to improve and scale our brand. Compared to our previous ESP, the platform is much more user-friendly, the support has been better and the help more useful in terms of email and retention assistance.

all_reviews.review_title: Emarsys has played a big role in the growth of our business both online and offline!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Emarsys makes it very easy to automate all marketing communications through their easy to use user interface. Also, Emarsys makes data available for my team which helps us coming up with meaningful data analysis very efficiently.
One of the biggest wins that we have achieved through Emarsys was improving our shopping cart abandonment rate which continuously improves our online revenue.
Being able to conduct effective A/B testing has been another benefit to our company where we were able to optimize our content effectively and improve metrics such as Open and CTR.
Another feature that we utilize very frequently through Emarsys is creating audiences and making that audience available for my team to run campaigns through Facebook, Instagram and Google.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Tracking the in-store performance has been a challenge which had made things difficult to track omni-channel performance. This issue was mainly on our end, however, Emarsys was able to come up with new features that was able resolve this and take our marketing efforts to the next level.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the main issues that we have had historically, was improving the customer churn rate. We are trying to improve this segment by working with Emarsys' Artificial Intelligence solution to identify these segments automatically and improve the percentage of the customers that are likely to churn.
In addition to improving our customer churn rate, we have been working on identifying customer segments to further improve our conversion rates by sending relevant at the right time with the right offer.

all_reviews.review_content:

This is extremely useful for email customization and for audiences creation. Also, in this way only some information needs to be imported inside the platform with daily updates. Another feature I really like is the Automation center, a flexible tool to create paths for your customers, even using different channels or touchpoints. I personally use the platform mainly for emails, but the Automation Center gives me plenty of possibilities to plan my interactions with audience segments.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
It is not possible to combine combined segments and this makes the target creation a bit difficult sometimes. Also, the way Emarsys store the campaign information and performances using big query generates a bunch of rows and huge tables, since also a simple test or a CC email are recorded in separate rows. We needed to created cleaned-up tables into our company database. Also, it is not possible to understand where a customer clicked.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
Compare some other tools with it, also some well-known ones, and you will discover that Emarsys has good advantages in terms of functionalities and cost.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Compared to previous tools, Emarsys is much faster, more responsive and it hardly ever has bugs or get stuck when it processes a campaign. Emails are delivered fast, without delays.

all_reviews.review_title: Great features, great look, evolving.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Emarsys is a tool that is easy to navigate, learn, and utilize. Most of my everday tasks are quick, easy, and painless. The visual content editor is a huge time saver from the days when we had to setup every email that went out in html. The product recommendations are something we leverage in emails but also on our website and the logic that sits behind them seems pretty reliable. The automations/journeys are in a pretty good place and help the user create things like abandon cart with ease.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
The automations/journeys are in a great place right now, but there is a lot of room for improvement and growth. I believe Emarsys is actively working on this, however, so that is great!  There are some things inside of product recommendations that I wish were a little more customizeable, and I'm hoping they work on making that feature more robust in the near future as well. It can also be hard to figure out, in the platform, how to navigate and what to do with your bounces (especially hard and block bounces). There mobile customization could be a bit better -- there's an option to hide something from showing on mobile devices, but nothing to hide something from desktop devices which limits the ability to make a more mobile-only version of a regular email.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Emarsys makes my day quicker and easier than other ESPs we've used in the past. The platform is extremely reliable and I've had no major issues in the year and a half we've been on it. Other tools caused issues for us on a weekly (sometimes daily) basis. Emarsys is stable. The automation layout (for creating customer journeys) is a little finicky at times, but makes visually understanding what it is you're building easy.

In addition, we are expanding our form usage to collect rich data and further refine our consumer messaging.

all_reviews.review_title: Super easy to use. Great for a small marketing team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The best feature of Emarsys to us is the "Product Search" function. Since Emarsys is able to consume our large (200k+ SKU) catalog, it makes life easier when building ad-hoc email campaigns. The use of the template for ad-hoc emails is also very helpful. We are able to style our emails in various ways, but again without taking too much time. Product Recommendations is definitely a plus.  We see a larger click-thru and conversion rate on recommended items in emails since it is making the content more focused to the individual who is receiving and opening the email. Additionally while building out an email, before it is sent you can review the likelyhood of spam and overall rating of the general content of your email.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
I have been on Emarsys for about 30 days or so, and I have yet to find anything that really stands out to dislike. There is a bit of a learning curve from my old provider. As an example, you cannot import contacts into an existing list via the file upload. Instead you have to create a new list, then create what they call, combined segments, to join the lists together. However; this can be overcome if you are using their API to directly add/update/remove contacts from a list.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
For our small team, using Emarys's Services and creative team helped make the process much faster and smoother, and we got another set of creative direction that turned out great.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Much easier to load product data, the amount of time to build ad-hoc emails is drastically reduced. Segmentation is also much easier to use. Emarsys also provides product recommendations within emails and also on the website. I have noticed increased click-thru and conversion rate on those items. Additionally, we had Emarsys completely re-design all of our email automations. This allowed for a "refresh" of the look and feel, and also allowed us to adjust and optimize those automated emails.

all_reviews.review_title: The email platform that almost there
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Navigating throughout the platform is easy and very intuitive. Also, the speed in which we can make updates to a campaign or run a segmentation query helps us get our job done fast. Lasty, the flexibility by using the Emarsys Scripting Language helps us be personalized and show customers relevant content.

Using live site data we're able to give customers valid product recommendations based on their behavior, we're able to see this in action in the customers personal profile page where the Emarsys suite stores the last categories and products the customer browsed, from there it gives relevant tips on what else to purchase.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
First and foremost is the ability to export quality reporting. Especially automated reporting. We are told this is being developed but not having this out of the box is a miss. Using the block based builder is great, but the template has a known issue where when multiple users are making updates, once saved, the updates are then removed and emails end up reverting back to an old version. The block based builder is a great tool, I would like the Emarsys platform to be more customizable so that we can use our high level logic and not have to code complete emails in HTML.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
Ask the hard hitting questions and don't concede if you don't like what you're hearing. The implementation team is very smart and can almost always figure out a way to bridge gaps in the business so that it works out with the Emarsys suite. The platform has to work for your business .

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the issue of personalization. Every customer now has content shown to them that is relevant to their wants and past purchases. We show their reward balance in each email reminding them of the money they can spend in our store. By being more personalized, we are sending less email over all but seeing higher conversions and engagement rates across all of our emails. We are able to develop new programs and automations that will engage customers before they lapse and keep them in our purchase funnel making more purchases thus making our business more profitable.

all_reviews.review_title: Best ESP Around!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
I love how easy this ESP is to use - which is a lot to say for an enterprise solution. I have used Emarsys for a bigger company on Demandware and also for a small/midsize company in Shopify and it has been great in both of those environments. It is an ESP that we don't have to spend too much time troubleshooting or trying to figure out how to make something work - it is very intuitive and easy to use.  It actually allows marketers to be marketers. With Emarsys we are accomplishing wayyyyyy more than I have ever with the other big players in this space. We are no longer be held up on launching automations/flows due to troubleshooting the program - it is more, we can't produce enough creative fast enough to use all the tools they offer! But we are getting there. There account management is also best in class - from implementation managers to customer success managers - these are people who actually KNOW the tool they are helping customers with vs. passing our questions off to someone else or sending us to their help portal. That has been hugely beneficial. I also love that we can incorporate other marketing channels, like paid search and paid social, into our flows for our customers.

In my current role, we implemented them with a very small team and NO IT team - it was just our ecommerce  ops manager and digital marketing coordinator who did most of the heavy lifting - so it was very easy. We also used their shopify plugin which made it easy too.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
I don't have a lot of dislikes with Emarsys, they are pretty great! My only thing would be their text over image option for certain modules could use use some finessing, but that could also just be circumstantial to our creative. I have not found a lot of ESP's that allow for text over image through the module and not having to go into the code and add it...so that is nice when we can use it.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are creating more personalized journeys for our customers more quickly than ever before. In addition, we are able to use their smart insights to gain more info on our customers and target them with the right content at the right time.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform, great partnership
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
Our company's marketing programs are data-driven and extremely technical. I have had direct experience working with several enterprise-level marketing and automation platforms, and the features and functionality in Emarsys are best in class.

Some competitors in the space have slick sales pitches and demos that look good to the C-suite, but are severely lacking in actual functionality. The Emarsys platform has clearly been designed from the ground up to cater to the technical end users and developers who work with it day in and day out.

Beyond our direct usage of the product, the whole Emarsys team have been exemplary partners from day 1. We have built strong relationships across the organization, and it's refreshing to know that our voice as a customer and as a peer in the marketing space is being heard.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
The below are not necessarily gaps specific to Emarsys, but across all marketing platforms I've worked with. I do feel that Emarsys is best positioned to fill these gaps, given their strong focus on product development.

In some cases, more developer-focused aspects of the platform are not represented fully in the product documentation. Fortunately, the Emarsys team is willing and able to pass along our inquiries to the product developers, but it would be a benefit to more technical customers to flesh out that documentation a bit more.

We would also love to see OOTB support for a subprod testing environment, to reduce risk to business-critical campaigns when deploying enhancements or bug fixes.

Finally, users would benefit from more robust campaign monitoring. With a complex marketing program like ours, we may have dozens of automated campaigns running at any given time. We'd love a way to see at a glance that everything is running smoothly, and have real-time alerting for errors that Emarsys detects.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
Emarsys has transformed our marketing workflow and enabled countless new campaigns and enhancements that were impossible with our previous solution.

The Emarsys API has enabled us to automate our campaign production process. A workflow that previously required 20+ hours per week is now completed in 1-2 hours.

Using the Emarsys RDS solution, we are able to serve real-time data to our customers, improving their experience. The RDS has also replaced legacy ETL processes - campaigns that used to take over an hour to process now complete and send in seconds..

Overall, using Emarsys, we've achieved unprecedented consistency and efficiency across our marketing programs, and are able to develop and enhance campaigns with a relatively small production team.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Product and Partner
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
After our company has worked with several of the top email platforms over the last decade, I can say without a doubt that Emarsys is #1 in customer support. While we rarely have issues with the platform, when we do, we are getting quick and accurate support that isn't just copy/paste answers. Their team is extremely knowledgeable about their own product and helpful with finding solutions quick enough to support our e-commerce company.

Additionally, the platform itself is our favorite of those we've used. It has a streamlined approach so it's extremely efficient for our team to use, but Emarsys also hasn't cut out the needed features to have an extremely personalized approach to our customers. The platform is always evolving and having new features come out in Beta trials or even as free upgrade improvements. We couldn't be much happier than we have been since launching with Emarsys in 2016.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
While pricing is absolutely competitive, it's not the most streamlined model. While typical conversations with email providers are around how many emails you want to send, Emarsys has the added component of pricing around how many email addresses are being stored within the database (which powers tons of personalization features we love). It just makes the conversation a bit clunky, though it hasn't been a blocker as we are about to sign our next 3 year extension.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
Count how many people you have working on emails in your current team and consider what their pain points are in your current email solution. Where is time being drained from their efficiency? What makes them just want to pull their hair out about your current platform? Dig into those areas with Emarsys and get to understand what their solution would do for your team's time and sanity. I was the person building and sending emails in 2016 when we did this exercise and can say personally how impactful the conversation was to driving change for more success in our program.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had four people doing email with another larger ESP but now have a team of only 1.5 people due to all of the efficiency gains through better technology. Best of all we are getting so much more out of our email program! The level of personalization and advanced features has accelerated our program, engaged our email list longer and generally enhanced the experience our customers get from us. The migration to Emarsys has been a huge win for our company!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The amount that you can do with Emarsys is impressive and they are always growing their platform. It's very easy to connect your data across the board and to monitor all your KPIs in one place, seeing in real-time how every one of your campaigns contributes to your business. Their team is very professional and always ready to help, whether it be with something on a grand scale like integration, or just a small usage question.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Emarsys is huge--but that means that sometimes it takes time to get used to or to understand how to use every feature on their platform. It can sometimes start as a slow curve, but their documentation and their team are incredibly thorough, and they are always ready to offer additional support or training. That said, until you get used to the platform it may appear that some level of higher technical know-how is needed since it doesn't, at a glance, look as intuitive to use as something like Mailchimp. Take some time, get used to the platform, ask questions when you need to, and that does abate!

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
If you are uncertain about the cost, this platform is extensive and their support is excellent no matter who you're dealing with. There is an incredible amount you can do with Emarsys, it will just take some time to get used to and explore. That said, they are always ready to train on their features or answer any questions you have.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Emarsys to integrate almost all of our digital marketing and customer data. We run one-off email campaigns and full automation through Emarsys, and it's always remarkably easy to integrate our customer base for personalization or targeted campaigns--it's actually impressive the degree of customization we can achieve through Emarsys in regards to communicating with our customers. We also use it to personalize the content on our site, offering customers unique recommendations based on personal browse/purchase behavior or category. This, in turn, integrates right back into their profile on Emarsys which we then use to build targeted campaigns and newsletters.

all_reviews.review_title: Small teams and straightforward businesses like Emarsys
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
The ability to build block-based emails with highly customized templates is great! I love their optional content for blocks plus their block style settings. Getting that built out by the internal template team to be really easy to use and effective for our live text emails, etc. has been a huge boon to our design and CRM teams.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
Emarsys' doesn't have a perfect solution for a complex business like ours. We've made great incremental strides with relational data service, but the size of our data and the demanding joins we need to perform between tables and views causes some issues for Emarsys in general. I also think that the scripting language support isn't awesome, so we've had some trouble personalizing and if we didn't have a team on a specific project, I'm not sure we would have gotten things done correctly. More real-time data via APIs and better data connectivity to send engagement data back to internal data lakes would go a long way as well as continuing to build out their mobile offering.

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
For simple retail use cases (i.e. pure-play or omnichannel retailing) that is 24/7 and sells discrete things (i.e. not a marketplace), Emarsys is a useful tool that can help your team send out emails and pushes in an efficient manner. There are some interesting use cases for their new Tactics capabilities for aligning simple goals and setting forecasts. You are limited to a certain amount of fields against contact records and if you opt for the relational data solution, please have the resources in house to manage the segment templates (SQL) and personalization (scripting language). Also, consider the hosted version where you, as the brand, hosts your own versus Emarsys hosting. Real-time use cases, sophisticated mobile brands, and brands with large data orgs hungry for engagement data should probably keep looking.

What problems is Emarsys solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest thing that happened when we moved to Emarsys is the build-out of more and more complex automated campaigns as well as push messaging in particular. We've seen 6x the revenue per message from push v. email and we have 23+ campaigns versus 4 when we started. Once we had more robust campaigns up and running and added push components, we haven't been able to get much farther.

all_reviews.review_title: This Software Belongs in BETA
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Emarsys?
It can send emails. You can easily copy an old campaign and work off of it.

What do you dislike about Emarsys?
This platform reeks of an organization that runs on the mercy of venture capitalists driven by deadlines wherein the people behind the actual product pay no attention to detail of the software their company is producing.

Emarsys

* The software should be in BETA  - too many bugs!
* The admin itself is not intuitive, you have to find screens not found in the navigation to control email templates
* The email builder is based on templated HTML blocks that are annoying and frustrating to customize
* Drag and Drop / Reordering commonly doesn't properly work without refreshing page
* If you don't know HTML I don't recommend this platform, making changes to these templates takes way more time than it has to based on other email platforms I've used
* The screens to control these blocks are buried in the admin and hard to navigate
* If your code is invalid admin screens tend to lock up and it breaks the admin
* When you update a template block you have to manually update the template
* Smart Criterion
* Amount of emails collected and being sent for this smart insight are in my experience thus far are inaccurate
* Emarsys does not have the ability to report what specific emails were sent in given automation for troubleshooting purposes
* They charge you extra for reports the system cannot provide
* They charge $150 an hour for training
* Emails campaigns cannot be used in more than one automation flow
* I have wasted a serious amount of time logging into the actual platform
* Says my credentials are invalid when I go to reset claims I can't use an old password
* The technical support takes a long time to respond without getting to the bottom of the problem
* The platform is WAY overpriced and requires a long term contract commitment

Recommendations to others considering Emarsys:
